description: Assesses the legal foundation, infrastructure, and formal setup of your business, including licenses, bank accounts, and online/offline presence.

advice.message: Your business lacks essential legal and operational foundations, which puts it at high risk.
specificActions: Obtain or update your trade license immediately.
Open a business bank account in your organization’s name.
Set up a basic online presence through a website or marketplace profile.

resources.title: How to Register a Business License

advice.message: Your business has some foundations in place but is missing key elements for credibility and growth.
specificActions: Update outdated legal documents such as your trade license.
Open or strengthen your presence on multiple social media platforms.
Consider establishing an offline office or showroom for customer trust.

advice.message: Your business has a solid legal and operational foundation. Focus on strengthening visibility and credibility.
specificActions: Invest in a professional website that reflects your brand identity.
Register your business on leading marketplaces such as Daraz.
Leverage social media platforms to enhance brand authority.

advice.message: Your business has strong legal standing, infrastructure, and presence across multiple channels. Focus on scaling and advanced compliance.
specificActions: Expand into international marketplaces to increase reach.
Adopt advanced compliance and governance practices.
Showcase certifications and awards to build stronger brand trust.

description: Assesses your understanding of your market, customer base, and competitive landscape.

advice.message: Your understanding of the market and customer base is critically lacking. Immediate action is needed.
specificActions: Conduct thorough market research to understand customer needs and trends.
Identify your target customer segments clearly.
Perform a competitor analysis to benchmark your position.

advice.message: You have a basic understanding of your market and customers, but there is room for improvement.
specificActions: Refine your customer personas.
Gather feedback through surveys or interviews.
Use data analytics to identify customer behavior patterns.

advice.message: You have a solid grasp of your market and customer needs. Consider optimizing your strategies further.
specificActions: Leverage CRM tools to manage customer relationships.
Explore niche market opportunities.
Track customer satisfaction regularly.

advice.message: You have an excellent understanding of your market and customers. Focus on innovation and growth.
specificActions: Implement advanced customer segmentation strategies.
Explore global market opportunities.
Invest in predictive analytics for customer trends.

description: Evaluates the clarity, documentation, and execution plan for your organization's long-term goals and vision.

advice.message: Your organization lacks a clear or documented vision for the future. This can severely limit growth potential.
specificActions: Define a clear 5-year vision or SMART goal for your organization.
Document your vision in writing and share it with your team.
Conduct strategy workshops to align stakeholders on long-term objectives.

advice.message: You have some ideas for your vision or goals, but they are not fully documented or actionable.
specificActions: Refine your long-term vision into measurable SMART goals.
Develop an actionable roadmap with milestones.
Ensure your goals are communicated to all team members.

advice.message: Your vision and goals are clear and documented, but there is room to strengthen execution.
specificActions: Review your action plan quarterly and adjust as needed.
Allocate resources to priority projects that align with your vision.
Monitor key performance indicators linked to your goals.

advice.message: You have a well-defined and documented vision with a strong execution plan. Focus on innovation to stay ahead.
specificActions: Explore expansion opportunities aligned with your vision.
Invest in leadership development to support long-term growth.
Regularly revisit and update your vision to adapt to market changes.

description: Assesses the organization's manpower, operational systems, and strategic planning effectiveness.

advice.message: Your organization lacks the necessary manpower, systems, or strategy to operate effectively.
specificActions: Recruit and train employees to fill key skill gaps.
Implement basic operational systems to ensure smooth workflow.
Develop a foundational strategic marketing plan.

advice.message: You have some manpower and systems in place, but they are not yet optimal for growth.
specificActions: Enhance employee skill development programs.
Refine operational processes for better efficiency.
Create a detailed strategic marketing plan with timelines.

advice.message: Your organization has solid manpower, systems, and strategies. Focus on optimization.
specificActions: Introduce automation tools to streamline operations.
Implement leadership training for mid-level managers.
Regularly update your strategic marketing plan to reflect market changes.

advice.message: You have excellent manpower, systems, and strategies in place. Focus on innovation and scaling.
specificActions: Expand into new markets leveraging your existing strengths.
Invest in advanced technologies to further enhance productivity.
Mentor other businesses or participate in industry leadership initiatives.

description: Evaluates the financial health, productivity levels, and growth potential of your business.

advice.message: Your financial stability and productivity are at a critical level, putting your business at high risk.
specificActions: Reduce unnecessary expenses and optimize your cost structure.
Focus on increasing sales through targeted marketing campaigns.
Improve cash flow management to cover monthly fixed costs.

advice.message: Your finances and productivity are functional but leave room for improvement in profitability and growth.
specificActions: Increase profit margins by renegotiating supplier costs.
Boost production efficiency with better planning and resource allocation.
Set quarterly financial and productivity targets.

advice.message: Your business shows solid financial and productivity performance. Focus on scaling and sustained growth.
specificActions: Reinvest profits into technology and skilled manpower.
Expand production capacity to meet growing demand.
Track customer acquisition and retention costs to maximize ROI.

advice.message: Your financial performance and productivity are excellent. Focus on innovation and market leadership.
specificActions: Diversify your product or service portfolio.
Enter new markets to expand customer base.
Invest in advanced productivity tools and data analytics.

description: Assesses the uniqueness, quality, branding, and pricing strategy of your product to ensure strong customer satisfaction.

advice.message: Your product lacks uniqueness, proper branding, or smart pricing. This puts customer satisfaction and long-term growth at serious risk.
specificActions: Identify at least one unique feature that differentiates your product from competitors.
Improve basic quality and packaging standards.
Develop a clear pricing strategy aligned with your business plan.

advice.message: Your product meets basic needs but lacks strong differentiation or brand representation.
specificActions: Enhance packaging to represent your brand more clearly.
Collect customer feedback to identify areas for product improvement.
Refine pricing policies to balance affordability and profitability.

advice.message: Your product satisfies customer needs and shows clear branding. Focus now on optimization and innovation.
specificActions: Introduce new features or upgrades to maintain competitiveness.
Explore eco-friendly or premium packaging options.
Monitor pricing strategies against market trends.

advice.message: Your product is highly unique, well-branded, and follows a smart pricing policy. Customers are highly satisfied — leverage this for growth.
specificActions: Expand product lines or introduce premium versions.
Leverage strong branding to enter new markets.
Invest in R&D to stay ahead of competitors.

description: Assesses the digital presence and visibility of your organization across social media and online platforms.

advice.message: Your business has very low online visibility. Customers may not be able to easily find or connect with you online.
specificActions: Create or optimize your Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube pages.
Post consistently to build a minimum level of brand awareness.
Run small paid campaigns to boost reach and engagement.

resources.title: Beginner’s Guide to Social Media Marketing
How to Create a Business Facebook Page

advice.message: Your online visibility is developing but still limited. You need stronger engagement and consistent branding.
specificActions: Increase posting frequency with engaging and visual content.
Encourage customers to follow and review your business online.
Collaborate with influencers or partners to expand visibility.

advice.message: Your online visibility is strong, and you have an active social media presence. Focus on strategic growth.
specificActions: Use analytics to identify which platforms bring the most engagement.
Experiment with video content to increase reach and retention.
Invest in branded content campaigns to strengthen positioning.

advice.message: Your online visibility is excellent. You have a strong digital footprint across platforms. Leverage it for leadership and scaling.
specificActions: Expand into new platforms such as LinkedIn or TikTok to diversify reach.
Run advanced ad campaigns with retargeting to maximize ROI.
Position your brand as an industry leader through thought leadership content.
